en.today: Your day gets off to a busy start as the moon continues through Sagittarius, dearest Ram, forming connections with Jupiter, Chiron, the nodes of fate, and Saturn. A measured approach to your agenda serves you best, and a little bit of mystery can help you go further. Rather than barreling forward, exercise restraint and work from behind the scenes. Commission someone with more experience for their honest feedback once Luna enters Capricorn midafternoon. Watch out for smoke and mirrors when Neptune stirs later today, especially when following other people's leads. Touch base with your gratitude to find clarity while the sun aspects the nodes of fate this evening.

en.today: The Sagittarius moon keeps busy this morning, dear Leo, forming connections with Jupiter, Chiron, the nodes of fate, and Saturn. This energy puts you in a dreamy yet flighty headspace, making it difficult to focus or make commitments. Give yourself space to explore fresh opportunities, but don't make any critical decisions just yet. Connect with your body midafternoon when Luna enters Capricorn, encouraging you to prioritize wellness and stress relief. Merge spirituality and healthy living when Neptune stirs later today, inviting you to get mystical. You'll feel more practical and ready to strategize for the future once the sun aspects the lunar nodes this evening.

en.today: Avoid rushing through your commitments as the moon moves through Sagittarius, dear Taurus, forming connections with Jupiter, Chiron, the nodes of fate, and Saturn. Though a sense of urgency will be present, it'll be vital that you stay grounded to maintain clarity. Disaster can be avoided when you choose your battles wisely and grant yourself grace while pressure mounds. You'll feel more optimistic and in control once Luna enters Capricorn midafternoon, blessing you with some extra support from beyond. Let your mystical side take you on an adventure when Neptune activates. Meanwhile, the sun aspects the nodes of fate, paving the way for new friendships.

en.today: Unwelcome obstacles could disrupt your flow this morning, dearest Gemini, as the Sagittarius moon aligns with Jupiter, Chiron, the nodes of fate, and Saturn. It may be necessary to tie up loose ends or deal with unresolved issues before you can move forward in peace. An empowering energy finds you once Luna enters Capricorn midafternoon, granting you the determination necessary to find higher ground. Lean into release while inviting in blessings so your life can transform. Try not to get lost in your screens when Neptune activates, bringing a hazy energy to the table. Instead, spend some time alone while strategizing your next bold move while the sun aspects the nodes of fate.
